dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Re: DMCA Notice]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, July 14, 2005 5:01 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; kasslloyd@gmail.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Re: DMCA Notice]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Re: DMCA Notice
Date: Wed, 13 Jul 2005 19:27:24 -0400
From: Kass Lloyd <kasslloyd@gmail.com>
Reply-To: raeky@raeky.com
To: webmaster@gamerzplanet.net
CC: jps@layeredtech.com, abuse@theplanet.com
References: <24c84eb505071316064219e281@mail.gmail.com>
<E1DsqTS-00008H-NF@gzp.gzphost.net>

Please make sure you don't host cracked versions of our software on your
site (d2jsp), we will be making periodic checks now to verify compliance. I
still note not all the threads listed have yet to be removed, but its only
been 10 minutes or so, so thanks for getting back with us so fast. I'd also
like to point out that you do also host cracked versions of mousepad's
maphack, this too is a copyrighted piece of software that is being illegally
hosted on your site, but since I don't represent the copyright holder I
can't officially ask you to remove it, but in case you don't want to receive
future notices from mousepad, you might want to remove it as well.

Thank you for your time in dealing with this matter, and I hope we don't
have any problems with your website again in the future.

Kass

On 7/13/05, Skyline_GTR <webmaster@gamerzplanet.net> wrote:
> 
> 
> Those threads removed.
> 
> 
> ---------GzP----------
> -Skyline_GTR
> Webmaster Of GzP
> http://www.gamerzplanet.net
> 
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Kass Lloyd" <kasslloyd@gmail.com>
> To: abuse@theplanet.com, jps@layeredtech.com, 
> dzq5m1javh.protect@whoisguard.com
> Sent: Wednesday, July 13, 2005 06:07 PM
> Subject: DMCA Notice
> 
>  Dear Sir or Madam,
> 
>  This letter serves as notification under the Digital Millennium  
> Copyright Act, 17 U.S.C.
